title: 4/13 Live Maintenance [Possible DCâ€™s, Ranked Disabled, and more]
body:
Hey all,

We wanted to give everyone a heads up that at 2:00AM PDT we will be performing some live maintenance on our platform, ending around 5:00AM PDT.  This is part 1 of a 2 step process where we are making some improvements to our network infrastructure between the LoL Platform (PvP.net) and some of our [Point-of-Presences](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204246204-NA-Server-Roadmap#h3q2).  We know that this may cause some stability problems where players could experience disconnects, packet loss, or high ping, which is why we’re doing this in the wee early hours of the morning.

We’ll also be disabling ranked as a precaution.  The last thing we want is an epic backdoor to fail due to the ADC disconnecting and autoing minions instead of stopping the backing of the enemy team.

Drop us a comment if you are seeing any extreme issues during this time.  We’ll have some people on-deck keeping an eye on the thread and responding when possible.

replies.body: This would have been lovely to know before trying to queue up and finding myself stuck in a dynamic queue for 5 minutes just stuck in the banning phase.

Keep in mind that this particular maintenance is for 2AM, tomorrow (4/13).  If you had some issues in Champ Select, it seems unrelated to this.  If you are still consistently having issues, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to us so we can help out!
any update on mac fps drop bug??

I hope they fix it. Its really embarassing how long they are letting this problem just sit there.  In order for Mac users to not lag you have to play without sound. Its frustrating but its the only way we can play nowadays.

I've had problems for months now, giving me extremely long wait times and bans. My champion select always freezes if someone hits 0 and the mac client sucks. I'm so disappointed with Riot for this issue. I can't even play the game.

So far it's been a challenge to get a machine to reproduce this 100% reliably which means it's hard to identify the root cause. There's a few potential fixes being worked on, but nothing 100% certain at the moment.
Wait, it's a problem for everyone?  I always thought it was just my mac getting older..
U also experience this during the team fight?
any update on mac fps drop bug??

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=b9TERueg,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-13T01:54:31.340+0000)
> We’ll also be disabling ranked as a precaution.  The last thing we want is an epic backdoor to fail due to the ADC disconnecting and autoing minions instead of stopping the backing of the enemy team.

but mages (or abilities) are better at doing that than adcs (or autos) in the first place

because aoe

unless the adc has runaan's, but then the autoing of nearby minions would be plenty to stop the recalls.

unless of course you're referring to the fact that so many adcs get played that the adc would end up being cast in the place of an aoe mage's back-halting?
You're overthinking it a bit.

Ok. A: don't be a butt on purpose. B: It's whoever's there to stop the recalls. C: if they dc'd and attacked the minions even runaan's wouldn't do much unless the enemy team is stupid. What if the mage died? There's no single person on a team that's devoted to stopping people from recalling, like, hello? You say it like the mage is the chosen one to stop recalls. It's literally the closest person.


Would you rather them just be monotone and not try to add some fun into the post?

I cannot log into the game. period. off either of my accounts. Iv deleted and reinstall league. I have flushed dns. I have restarted router/ and computer multiple times. I have done ip configuration. We have run administrator and firewall are disabled. I have been struggling for a couple hours. :(
I've come across the same issue. :(

well, i do see some "extremity" but it is not an issue.
I used to have issues where I connect to a different server ip address when loading in each game. 
Sometimes the game loaded with 3-40 ping whereas other times the game loaded at 90-100 ping. 
It never fluctuated once the game loads, and I could spam alt f4 to reload the game until it restarted with 30-40 ping.
well... that is now fixed and it is even before the scheduled maintenance.
i tried making custom games 10 times. 
and usually 5 of 10 games would be problematic but just now i saw all ten games with normal pings. 
let me know if this is due to a tweak from your end?

I remember I would always play LoL at around 1-6 AM because my parents don't understand that I can't pause the game. I still play at my prime around 1-6 AM because my sleep schedule is 3-10 PM and I do all my school stuff at 10-12. It's kinda hard to do that now because college gives you so much work.

Lucky I ddecided not to play another game and just look at the board instead.
